properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:51AM CST until January 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Illinois...

Fox River at Dayton affecting La Salle County
Mazon River near Coal City affecting Grundy County

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Fox River at Dayton, or from Millington downstream to
confluence with the Illinois River.
* from this evening to Monday morning.
* At  745 AM Saturday the stage was 9.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tonight and continue to rise
to near 12.5 feet by Sunday afternoon. The river will fall below
flood stage by early Monday morning.
* Impact...At 12.0 feet...The river begins to overflow banks in the
lowest areas.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.
